alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:43PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Churchill and northern Lyon Counties through 545 PM PDT... At 440 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Silver Springs to 14 miles south of Stillwater. HAZARD...Heavy rain and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain may limit visibility and result in minor flooding on areas roads, especially low water crossings. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Lahontan Reservoir, Fernley, Hazen, Middlegate, Stillwater, Silver Springs, Stagecoach, Fort Churchill Station, Junction U.S 50 And Nv 121 (Dixie Valley Rd), Junction U.S 50 And NV 839, Junction U.S 50 And NV 116 (Stuart Rd), Frenchman, Fairview Peak, Dixie Valley, Sand Mountain Campground, and Mount Lincoln. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
